rows.label: MesLock_001
rows.name:
First, let's head to the Habitat—the White Whale's
residential unit. The planet's not going anywhere,
so exploring can wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_002
rows.name:
We need to plant that data probe.
Let's set a course for east NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_003
rows.name:
Let's head to the administrative district.
I'll show you where you'll be staying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_004
rows.name:
We need to show you the administrative district.
We'll get to the other areas in due time, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_005
rows.name:
I know you're raring to go, but we should take a
breather at the Home and report to Nagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_006
rows.name:
Our top priority is accomplishing the mission.
We've got a destination, so let's double-time it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_007
rows.name:
Time to rest is a luxury we don't have—
the mission is all that matters now.
We must protect NLA at all costs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_008
rows.name:
It wouldn't be wise to stray from this area.
Vandham's counting on us to finish the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_009
rows.name:
Let's hop a ride on that transport to get to
the AD. Just talk to the pilot to get going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_010
rows.name:
Our top priority is the mission.
Continue defending the east gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_011
rows.name:
Let's make a beeline for the administrative
district. No side trips![ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_012
rows.name:
This gate is still sealed.
Let's circle around to the other entrance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_013
rows.name:
Let's set a course for the Home.
We can sightsee later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_101
rows.name:
Let's make for the bridge.
This can't really afford to wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: MesLock_102
rows.name:
This is no time to be hanging around.
We have to settle this...[ST:wait ]
